scripts.prepare-kb-documents: mkdir -p public/kb-documents && (cd knowledge-base/documents && find . -type d -exec mkdir -p ../../public/kb-documents/{} \; && find . -name "*.pdf" -exec cp -p {} ../../public/kb-documents/{} \; && cd ../..)
scripts.fetch-politicians: cd commands && bun install && bun run fetch-politicians
scripts.extract-parties: cd commands && bun install && bun run extract-parties
scripts.test-fetch-votes: cd commands && bun install && bun run test-fetch-votes
scripts.performance-test: cd commands && bun install && bun run performance-test
scripts.concurrency-test: cd commands && bun install && bun run concurrency-test
scripts.fetch-votes: cd commands && bun install && bun run fetch-votes
scripts.test-fetch-voteringar: cd commands && bun install && bun run test-fetch-voteringar
scripts.fetch-voteringar: cd commands && bun install && bun run fetch-voteringar
scripts.enrich-voteringar: cd commands && bun install && bun run enrich-voteringar
scripts.test-enrich-voteringar: cd commands && bun install && bun run test-enrich-voteringar
